modName: Craftable Blood Crown or Jagged Helm Light and Heavy
summary:
Craftable Blood Crown or Helm - Light and Heavy - male and female added Jagged Crown Normal

This is an upgrade of an old mod retexture to a standalone version.
descriptionHtml:
Craftable Blood Crown or Helm, Light and Heavy, Male and Female

Update
1.4 Added a set in the world near the beginning of the game you can find.
1.3 fixed meshes problem that was not showing textures in game, but right in menu
1.2 Added Jagged Crown Normal and reduced cost to make and sell.

This is an upgrade of an old mod retexture to a standalone version.
